title: Highest proportion of arable land
description: In 2022, 60.52% of Bangladesh's land area was arable, making it one of the highest in the world.

title: Highest percentage of irrigated agricultural land
description: In 2021, 78.90% of Bangladesh's agricultural land was irrigated, one of the highest percentages globally.

title: Lowest trade in services as a percentage of GDP
description: In 2023, trade in services accounted for only 3.60% of Bangladesh's GDP, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Highest contribution of textiles and clothing to manufacturing
description: In 2018, textiles and clothing made up 56.81% of the value added in Bangladesh's manufacturing sector, one of the highest globally.

title: Lowest domestic general government health expenditure as a percentage of GDP
description: In 2022, Bangladesh's domestic general government health expenditure was only 0.15% of GDP, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Highest bound rate for primary products
description: In 2022, Bangladesh had a bound rate of 179.79% for primary products, one of the highest globally.

title: Highest manufactures exports as a percentage of merchandise exports
description: In 2015, 95.81% of Bangladesh's merchandise exports were manufactures, one of the highest percentages in the world.
